name: SHORT TEXTURED WEAVE BLAZER
description: Blazer featuring a lapel collar and long sleeves with shoulder pads. Lapel details on the front. Raised button fastening on the front.

name: SHAWL LAPEL BLAZER
description: Blazer with a shawl collar and long sleeves. Front flap pockets and a welt chest pocket. Matching lining. Fastening at the front with a covered button in matching fabric.

name: JACQUARD WOOL BLEND COAT - LIMITED EDITION
description: Long coat made of a wool blend. Round neck and long sleeves. Front patch pockets. Tie belt in the same fabric.

name: SEAMLESS DRESS WITH GATHERED DETAILS
description: Sleeveless dress with a round neckline. Gathered details with ties on the sides.

name: PRINTED DRESS WITH ASYMMETRIC HEM
description: Midi dress made of cotton. Asymmetric neckline and wide straps. Tied belt in the same fabric. Invisible side zip fastening.

name: ZW UTILITY LOOSE FIT MID-RISE JEANS
description: Mid-rise trousers with belt loops. Patch pockets with zips on the front and legs and back patch pockets. Wide-leg design. Front zip fly and button fastening.

name: CROCHET HALTER DRESS
description: Halter dress featuring an adjustable V-neck with ties in the same fabric.

name: CONTRAST KNIT TOP WITH RUFFLED SLEEVES
description: Sleeveless top with a round neck, ruffle trim, contrast poplin fabric and a buttoned opening at the back.

name: RIBBED COTTON T-SHIRT
description: Round neck T-shirt made of cotton with short sleeves.

name: SHORT TAILORED WAISTCOAT
description: V-neck waistcoat. Featuring false welt pockets and button fastening on the front.

name: STRAIGHT CROPPED HIGH-WAIST COMFORT JEANS
description: High-waist jeans with a five-pocket design. Straight cropped leg. Front zip fly and button fastening.

name: OVERSHIRT WITH ADJUSTABLE WAIST
description: Collared overshirt featuring turn-up long sleeves with buttoned tabs. Front flaps and an adjustable waist with drawstring. Front pockets. Snap-button fastenings at the front.

name: BELTED CARGO BERMUDAS
description: High-waist Bermuda shorts with wrap-style front and front buckle. Side patch pockets with flaps. Invisible back zip fastening.

name: PRINTED REVERSIBLE KIMONO
description: Open kimono with loose-fitting short sleeves and inner opening detail.

name: LINEN BLEND CROPPED JACKET
description: Jacket made of a linen blend fabric. Lapel collar and long sleeves. Front patch pockets. Button-up front.

name: OVERSIZE SHORT TRENCH COAT
description: Trench coat with a lapel collar and a crossover neckline. Long sleeves with tabs. Belt with contrast buckle at the hem. Front button fastening.

name: PRINTED BLOUSE WITH BOW
description: Cropped blouse made of a linen blend. Johnny collar and long wide sleeves. Button and tie fastening at the front.

name: SATIN PLAYSUIT
description: V-neck playsuit with wide sleeves falling below the elbow. Elasticated waist. Lining. Fastening with buttoned opening at the back.

name: EMBROIDERED COTTON BLOUSE
description: Long sleeve V-neck blouse made of cotton. Contrast embroidery detail. Button-up fastening at the front.

name: CROPPED POPLIN SHIRT
description: Cropped collared shirt with short sleeves. Adjustable hem with drawstrings in the same fabric. Button-up front.
